00166 int writeArray

00168         const Array< T >&       arr,
00169         std::ostream&           os,
00170         const std::string       beginRecord     = "",
00171         const std::string       endRecord       = "\n",
00172         char                            separator       = '\t',
00173         char                            recordSeparator = '\0'
00174 )
00175 {
00176     if( arr.ndim( ) != 0 && os.good( ) )
00177         {
00178         os << beginRecord;
00179         }
00180 
00181     if( arr.ndim( ) <= 1 )
00182         {
00183         for( unsigned i = 0; i < arr.nelem( ) && os.good( ); ++i )
00184                 {
00185                         if( i )
00186                         {
00187                                 os << separator;
00188                         }
00189                         os << arr.elem( i );
00190                 }
00191         }
00192     else
00193         {
00194         for( unsigned i = 0; i < arr.dim( 0 ) && os.good( ); ++i )
00195                 {
00196                         if( i && recordSeparator )
00197                         {
00198                                 os << recordSeparator;
00199                         }
00200                         writeArray( arr[ i ], os, beginRecord, endRecord, separator );
00201                 }
00202         }
00203 
00204     if( arr.ndim( ) != 0 && os.good( ) )
00205         {
00206         os << endRecord;
00207         }
00208 
00209     return os.good( ) ? 0 : -1;
